\# pmdt



`pmdt` provides classes for project scheduling, Earned Value Management (EVM)

and Monte Carlo simulation:



\- `Calendar` – working days, holidays, network days, workday calculations

\- `Resource` – cost, availability, allocations

\- `Activity` – dependencies, costs, EVM tracking, Monte Carlo sampling

\- `ControlAccount` – EVM metrics at control account level

\- `Project` – CPM scheduling, tracking, Monte Carlo analysis and plotting

\- `Portfolio` – multiple projects and portfolio EVM



\## Installation



```bash

pip install pmdt
